duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Assist with store opening and closing, ensuring a safe and legal trading environment.
Deliver sales through friendly and efficient customer service.
Ensure customers have a fun and enjoyable shopping experience.
Assist with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Provide ear piercing services after receiving full training.
Maintain the store's presentable and inviting appearance for customers.
